content: शिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [शास् क्त शिष-क्त वा] {@--1@} Left, remaining, residual, rest. {@--2@} Ordered, commanded. {@--3@} Trained, educated, disciplined. {@--4@} Tamed, docile, tractable. {@--5@} Wise, learned; <ls>Śi. 2. 10</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 234.</ls> {@--6@} Virtuous, respectable. {@--7@} Civil, polite. {@--8@} Chief, principal, superior, excellent, distinguished, eminent; <ls>R. 1. 28.</ls> --ष्टः {@--1@} An eminent or distinguished person. {@--2@} A wise man. {@--3@} A counsellor.
